oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Historical Sketches of the Davidson County Schools, compiled by Julia McClung Green, 1952
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A typescript of "Historical Sketches of the Davidson County Schools," compiled by Julia McClung Green, 1952. The Table of Contents: Introduction--Dedication--Acknowledgements--Elementary Schools: Alex Green--Andrew Jackson--Andrews, Julia--Antioch--Berry--Bordeaux--Burton--Cane Ridge--Dodson--DuPont--Early--Edenwold--Ewing--Forest Grove--Goodlettsville--Gower--Hamilton--Harpeth Valley--Inglewood--Jere Baxter--Joelton--Jordonia--Joy--Lickton--Mills--Mims--Morny--Morrow Headden--Mt. View--Neely's Bend--Oglesby--Old Center--Parmer--Richland--Robertson Academy--rosemont--Shwab--Stokes--Stratton--Turner--Tusculum--Una--Union Hill--Wade--Woodbine--Woodmont. High Schools: Antioch High--Bellevue High--Central High--Cumberland High--Donelson High--DuPont High--Isaac Litton--Joelton High. New Schools (after 1952): Dalewood--John B. Whitsitt--Julia Green--Rosemont- name changed to Margaret Allen--Mt. View--Amqui--Thompson Lane--Brick Church--Martha Vaught--Providence. Forms part of Publications, Typescripts Collection (Ref. 370.9768 H673).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Green, Julia McClung
